column2:
"With Harriet installed as ruler, peace and stability
were returning to the Kingdom of Cuent."

"However, Harriet's intentions went
beyond her own nation's borders."

"The newly-restored Cuent prepared to
make its move to eliminate the
all-consuming seedless flower, Ephimera."
"First, let us establish what we know about our neighboring nations. Valna, if you would."

"This continent is roughly divided into East, West, North
and South, each of which is occupied by one of four nations."

"To the East lies the Es-Ars Federation.
This nation was founded by merchants who profit
through from the fertile land and its resources."

"They specialize in the arcane art of proliferation.
Reportedly, they are able to use the power of Ephimera
to multiply their crops and produce, among other things."

"On the surface, it seems peaceful enough.
However, it still uses Ephimera, so
there is likely something sinister to it."

"To the West is the Holy Kingdom of Epic.
This kingdom was established at an oasis,
where ascetics gathered to seek enlightenment."
"According to rumor, they have succeeded in refining a potion that can control hearts and minds. Using Ephimera, no doubt."

"In the North, the Verunian Empire.
They are a warrior nation, who choose the mightiest
warrior of their previous generation to be their Emperor."

"It is a land of barbarians and fools.
They have found a way to augment
their bodies with demonic elements."

"Which leaves ourselves, the Magic
Kingdom of Cuent, in the south.
Our focus is on applying Mana throughout nature."

"Our nation has made great progress
thanks to our magical research.
The Devil Castle was developed here,
and was once unique to Cuent."

"...However, it seems that somebody leaked
the technology, and all four nations now possess it."
"With the help of the Guardian, Cuent's Devil Castles are being wiped out one by one."
"However, each nation controls their own Devil Castles. These remain active, including those along the borders."
"With the Devil Castles in conflict, diplomatic relations between the nations have entirely broken down."
"At present, we have no idea as to the state of affairs within the other nations."
"Whenever someone attempts to cross over uninvited, a Devil Castle activates and moves to repel the intruders."
"Well, I'm sure that none are foolish enough to attempt such a thing."
"I have a report! A Devil Castle has activated on our border with Verun! Something is coming our way!"
"...So, there are still some foolish enough to attempt such a thing."
"It may be an emissary from Verun. We must hurry to the border!"
"The Destruction and Struggle"
"A Nation in Ruins"
"Soldier"
